about.title: About 블록 슬라이드 (Block Slide)
about.tagline: The Perfect Blend of 2048 and Tetris
about.description: 블록 슬라이드 (Block Slide) is an innovative browser-based puzzle game that combines the addictive number-merging mechanics of 2048 with strategic block placement of Tetris.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.tagline: We'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: Have questions, bug reports, or feedback? Feel free to reach out anytime!
